LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, remember back in the day when we used to hang out and stuff?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah... good times, huh?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh... they were times, all right.
Good times, not so much.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %gender(i,dude,girl)%, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I was just thinking about the last time we hung out. %random(Remember that crazy thing with the thing?,Remember how awesome that was?,Didn't we have good times?,I can't believe we got away with that.,I totally want to blog about it.,I totally posted a bunch of photos online from that.,Can you send me that video you took?)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(OMG totally,Definitely,No doubt)%. You were so %if(0,decked out)elseif(2,on your game)elseif(3,crazy)else(cool)%. Definitely good times.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %buddy%, what's happening?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I was just thinking about that time when %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hellz yeah. That was great.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You know it.
%r%... I know we've had issues, but remember back in like eighth grade? We used to have fun then, right?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %gender(i,Man,Sweetheart)%, in eighth grade I mostly remember you %if(1,flirting with anything that moved)elseif(2,playing with your Space Command action figures)elseif(3,being a total douche)elseif(4,going on about how much better than everyone you were)else(being a loser)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're a monster.
%greeting%... %gender(r,man,hey)%, we used to have some good times, didn't we?

Like this one.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, do you remember when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: OMG, like it was yesterday.
Wait, when was that? Was it yesterday?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Eh, I don't remember. Anyway good times, am I right?
Hey %buddy%! I was just thinking about that time when %toc1%. That was totally cool.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I suppose so. But you know, so many cool things happen to me I don't really keep track of them all.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're the man, %gender(r,man,girl)%.
What up, %r%. Hey, did I ever tell you about that time when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Only like a million times.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hehe, sorry.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It's all good. Just let me know when the movie comes out, %buddy%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%. Hey, you remember when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Not really.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Whatever. I guess I wouldn't expect someone as uncool as you to appreciate something like that.
%greeting%, %r%. So I heard that %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah. I mean, that's how it's been going around, anyway.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That sucks %buddy%. We should hang out later and do something cool.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sweet! Later.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %greeting%, %sweetie%. What's on your mind?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I was justing thinking about that time %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Nice to see you too, you %random(magnificant failure of a ,hateful snake of a,pitiful excuse for a)% %gender(i,man,woman)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %if(0,Why am I dating such a sexist jerk?)elseif(1,Why am I dating such a sexist jerk?)else(That doesn't even make sense. Why am I dating someone so incoherent?)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Go bite %random(a laptop case,a gopher feeder,a lawnmower,an ice crampon)%, %pejorative%.

Oh, I forgot to tell you earlier... %random(you're also a loser,yearbook voted you most likely to succeed at sucking,about those rabid squirrels in your locker-- that was me,I totally posted those pictures of you looking really fat on your profile page)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Who wouldn't want to be like %o%? But I'll try to be more like %pron(o,him/her)% for you, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Um, cool.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Nothing much... I was just thinking... sometimes, %o% is so much cooler than you are.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, I'm not cool enough for you? Is that it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh, sure thing, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Man, I love this band.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Seriously? You *like* them?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, I love these guys.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, man. Every time I hear them it's like %random(rusty nails shoved in my ears,nails on a chalkboard,the screeching of hell-spawned harpies,a thousand angry cats screaming,somebody pushed a washing machine down a flight of stairs)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: How can you say that? Their music is so *%random(meaningful,deep,profound,life-changing,twinkly,beautiful)%*.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ugh. You've got to be kiddng me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... and your shoes are ugly.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I keep meaning to get new ones!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ...you're not mad?
OMG I hate %random(biology,chemistry,physics)%. And there's like this %random(test coming up,quiz coming up,homework due,project due,paper due)% tomorrow. So crazy.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It's not that bad. Don't be such a whiner.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I am so not a whiner. %random(At least I'm not always going on about boring crap all the time.,Why are you always so mean to me?,What's your deal today?)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't have time for this.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%. I still can't believe that time when %toc1%. Sooo lame.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you still hung up on that? Get over it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: How could I get over something so epically lame?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah. Yeah. Maybe first you should get over yourself.
...shut up.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%... you know %random(that funny noise you make when we hug,the way you scratch your ear when we're cuddling,when you laugh real loud sometimes,the way you run your fingers through my hair)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yes, %sweetie%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(I don't like it,Quit it,It kind of annoys me,It really weirds me out)%. Please stop.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You know %i%, I love you, but I don't really like you sometimes.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look, %r%. I wish you would stop %random(putting those stupid stickers all over my locker,making that noise with your teeth,checking out hot freshmen in front of me,chewing bubble gum while when we're making out)% all the time.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well I wish YOU would stop %random(carving our names on trees,using all my glitter paint,throwing rocks at my parents bedroom window at night,eating so loudly,embarrassing me in class)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well I wish YOU wouldn't be so stupid.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well I wish YOU wouldn't be so selfish.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I love you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I love you too.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %sweetie%, what's wrong? %random(I texted you like five minutes ago and you never texted me back,You didn't respond to any of those texts I sent you in third period,I always see you texting your friends but you never text me.)% :-(

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you kidding? I get like no signal in here. And what's up with your profile page? %random(It still says single instead of in a relationship,You still have all those pictures of your ex up there,You haven't tagged me in any of those pics of us together,You totally never friended any of my friends who friended you even though you totally said you would)%. wtf?
OMG Whatever.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%. Were you watching me in geography class?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What? That's ridiculous. Don't flatter yourself.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, please. You couldn't stop staring at me all through that lecture about %random(Spanish rivers,Danish levies,the fjords of Norway,the Swedish road network,German township boundaries)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah? I'm not the one who scratched both our names into the topographic map of Africa.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Admit it. You want me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're pathetic.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %buddy%. So, just so you know, that was totally uncool how you blew me off to spend time with %o%. I mean, I know %gender(o,he's your boyfriend,she's your girlfriend)% or whatever, but still. We had plans, you know?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Plans? You said maybe we might hang out or something if nothing else was going on. I wouldn't call that a plan.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Whatever. It was totally uncool.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't get why you're making such a big deal out of it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's all about respect, %r%. That's all I'm saying. Respect.
%i% out.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Good times.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, %r%, I almost didn't see you there. You know why?
Because you're a nobody. And you'll always be a nobody. Now get out of my way, %pejorative%.
Hey %r%, I was just wondering... do you ever shut up?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Excuse me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Because I can always hear your stupid voice blabbling away in the background, blah blah blah, look at me I'm %gender(r,Mr,Mrs)% Center of Attention.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Go eat a rake, %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %pejorative%. I heard you have a %toc1%. Give it to me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It's mine. Leave me alone.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Give it to me or you'll regret it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No, don't take it! It's the only thing I've ever loved!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hahaha. I didn't want it anyway, crybaby. I just wanted to make you %gender(r,cry like a baby,beg for mercy)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I hate you forever.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %pejorative%. Are you still as much of a wuss as that time when %toc1%?
Are you sure?
That's what I thought. Stay stupid, loser-face.
Hey, %pejorative%. Are you still as much of a wuss as that time when %toc1%?
So you're *not* as much of a wuss, or you are?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yes, I'm not. Wait, what? Are you asking...?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Are you not or are you are a wuss?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're confusing me. Go away.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %pejorative%. Remember that time when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah. So?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well I forgot all about that. Let's let bygones be bygones.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh... okay.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh btw, and on a totally different subject, I just %random(put a dead squirrel in your locker and glued it shut,flushed your English paper down the toilet,gave your dog diarrhea,sold your cat to some dude on Craigslist)%. %gender(i,Later,Toodles)%!
Hey %r%, %random(you call that an outfit?,I thought I smelled you coming.,has anyone ever told you you walk like a lemur?)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm sorry, I can't hear you over the sound of me being awesome. Was there something you needed?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... you're a... uh... I...
Hey moron, I heard you got a 100 on the SAT. Too bad it's out of 1600.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Fool, I never even *took* the SAT.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Quod erat demonstrandum, my simple friend.
Hey shrimp, I'm gonna knock your block off. Prepare to get powned.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Though you may batter your fists against my body, you will never break my spirit.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh. Well that was actually kind of lovely. Are you going to read that in English class?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I was thinking about it.
